Main: ^More slimes?! Well, at least I've got the spear back!
^Guess I gotta show them how we throw down back home!
^Press left mouse to attack while the spear is held! You can't attack after throwing it!
Relic: ^I've never seen anything like that before... has some weird kind of energy surrounding it
^I may as well pick it up. If I can find the Elder, maybe he will know what it is, and there might be more around here!
NearEnd: ^But that light... an opening? I've almost made it out of here!
